00052         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00053         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_openImpl(Ogre::DataStreamPtr& fileStream)
00054         {
00055                 // WAVE descriptor vars
00056                 char*                   sound_buffer=0;
00057                 int                             bytesRead=0;
00058                 ChunkHeader             c;
00059 
00060                 // Store stream pointer
00061                 mAudioStream = fileStream;
00062 
00063                 // Allocate format structure
00064                 mFormatData.mFormat = OGRE_NEW_T(WaveHeader, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00065 
00066                 // Read in "RIFF" chunk descriptor (4 bytes)
00067                 mAudioStream->read(mFormatData.mFormat, sizeof(WaveHeader));
00068 
00069                 // Valid 'RIFF'?
00070                 if ( mFormatData.mFormat->mRIFF[0]=='R' && mFormatData.mFormat->mRIFF[1]=='I' && mFormatData.mFormat->mRIFF[2]=='F' && mFormatData.mFormat->mRIFF[3]=='F' )
00071                 {
00072                         // Valid 'WAVE'?
00073                         if ( mFormatData.mFormat->mWAVE[0]=='W' && mFormatData.mFormat->mWAVE[1]=='A' && mFormatData.mFormat->mWAVE[2]=='V' && mFormatData.mFormat->mWAVE[3]=='E' )
00074                         {
00075                                 // Valid 'fmt '?
00076                                 if ( mFormatData.mFormat->mFMT[0]=='f' && mFormatData.mFormat->mFMT[1]=='m' && mFormatData.mFormat->mFMT[2]=='t' && mFormatData.mFormat->mFMT[3]==' ' )
00077                                 {
00078                                         // SmFormatData.mFormat->uld be 16 unless compressed ( compressed NOT supported )
00079                                         if ( mFormatData.mFormat->mHeaderSize>=16 )
00080                                         {
00081                                                 // PCM == 1
00082                                                 if (mFormatData.mFormat->mFormatTag==0x0001 || mFormatData.mFormat->mFormatTag==0xFFFE)
00083                                                 {
00084                                                         // Samples check..
00085                                                         if ( (mFormatData.mFormat->mBitsPerSample!=16) && (mFormatData.mFormat->mBitsPerSample!=8) )
00086                                                         {
00087                                                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStaticWavSound::open() - WAV BitsPerSample not 8/16!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00088                                                                 throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00089                                                         }
00090 
00091                                                         // Calculate extra WAV header info
00092                                                         long int extraBytes = mFormatData.mFormat->mHeaderSize - (sizeof(WaveHeader) - 20);
00093 
00094                                                         // If WAVEFORMATEXTENSIBLE read attributes
00095                                                         if (mFormatData.mFormat->mFormatTag==0xFFFE)
00096                                                         {
00097                                                                 extraBytes-=static_cast<long>(mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData.mSamples, 2));
00098                                                                 extraBytes-=static_cast<long>(mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData.mChannelMask, 2));
00099                                                                 extraBytes-=static_cast<long>(mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData.mSubFormat, 16));
00100                                                         }
00101                 
00102                                                         // Skip
00103                                                         mAudioStream->skip(extraBytes);
00104 
00105                                                         do
00106                                                         {
00107                                                                 // Read in chunk id ( 4 bytes )
00108                                                                 mAudioStream->read(&c, sizeof(ChunkHeader));
00109 
00110                                                                 // 'data' chunk...
00111                                                                 if ( c.chunkID[0]=='d' && c.chunkID[1]=='a' && c.chunkID[2]=='t' && c.chunkID[3]=='a' )
00112                                                                 {
00113                                                                         // Store byte offset of start of audio data
00114                                                                         mAudioOffset = static_cast<unsigned long>(mAudioStream->tell());
00115 
00116                                                                         // Allocate array
00117                                                                         sound_buffer = OGRE_ALLOC_T(char, c.length, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00118 
00119                                                                         // Read entire sound data
00120                                                                         bytesRead = static_cast<int>(mAudioStream->read(sound_buffer, c.length));
00121 
00122                                                                         // Jump out
00123                                                                         break;
00124                                                                 }
00125                                                                 // Unsupported chunk...
00126                                                                 else
00127                                                                         mAudioStream->skip(c.length);
00128                                                         }
00129                                                         while ( mAudioStream->eof() || c.chunkID[0]!='d' || c.chunkID[1]!='a' || c.chunkID[2]!='t' || c.chunkID[3]!='a' );                                                      
00130                                                 }
00131                                         }
00132                                         else
00133                                         {
00134                                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStaticWavSound::open() - WAV not PCM!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00135                                                 throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00136                                         }
00137                                 }
00138                                 else
00139                                 {
00140                                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStaticWavSound::open() - Invalid format!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00141                                         throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00142                                 }
00143                         }
00144                         else
00145                         {
00146                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStaticWavSound::open() - Not a valid WAVE file!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00147                                 throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00148                         }
00149                 }
00150                 else
00151                 {
00152                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStaticWavSound::open() - Not a valid RIFF file!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00153                         throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00154                 }
00155 
00156                 // Create OpenAL buffer
00157                 alGetError();
00158                 alGenBuffers(NUM_BUFFERS, mBuffers);
00159                 if ( alGetError()!=AL_NO_ERROR )
00160                         throw std::string("Unable to create OpenAL buffers!");
00161 
00162                 // Check format support
00163                 if (!_queryBufferInfo())
00164                 {
00165                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- Format NOT supported");
00166                         throw std::string("Format NOT supported!");
00167                 }
00168 
00169                 // Calculate length in seconds
00170                 mPlayTime = ((mFormatData.mFormat->mLength-mAudioOffset) / ((mFormatData.mFormat->mBitsPerSample/8) * mFormatData.mFormat->mSamplesPerSec)) / mFormatData.mFormat->mChannels;
00171 
00172 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00173                 // Upload to XRAM buffers if available
00174                 if ( OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().hasXRamSupport() )
00175                         OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().setXRamBuffer(NUM_BUFFERS, mBuffers);
00176 #endif
00177         }
00178         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00179         bool OgreOggStreamWavSound::_queryBufferInfo()
00180         {
00181                 if ( !mFormatData.mFormat ) return false;
00182 
00183                 switch(mFormatData.mFormat->mChannels)
00184                 {
00185                 case 1:
00186                         {
00187                                 if ( mFormatData.mFormat->mBitsPerSample==8 )
00188                                 {
00189                                         // 8-bit mono
00190                                         mFormat = AL_FORMAT_MONO8;
00191 
00192                                         // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00193                                         mBufferSize = mFormatData.mFormat->mSamplesPerSec/4;
00194                                 }
00195                                 else
00196                                 {
00197                                         // 16-bit mono
00198                                         mFormat = AL_FORMAT_MONO16;
00199 
00200                                         // Queue 250ms of audio data
00201                                         mBufferSize = mFormatData.mFormat->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00202 
00203                                         // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00204                                         mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData.mFormat->mBlockAlign);
00205                                 }
00206                         }
00207                         break;
00208                 case 2:
00209                         {
00210                                 if ( mFormatData.mFormat->mBitsPerSample==8 )
00211                                 {
00212                                         // 8-bit stereo
00213                                         mFormat = AL_FORMAT_STEREO8;
00214 
00215                                         // Set BufferSize to 250ms (Frequency * 2 (8bit stereo) divided by 4 (quarter of a second))
00216                                         mBufferSize = mFormatData.mFormat->mSamplesPerSec >> 1;
00217 
00218                                         // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00219                                         mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % 2);
00220                                 }
00221                                 else
00222                                 {
00223                                         // 16-bit stereo
00224                                         mFormat = AL_FORMAT_STEREO16;
00225 
00226                                         // Queue 250ms of audio data
00227                                         mBufferSize = mFormatData.mFormat->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00228 
00229                                         // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00230                                         mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData.mFormat->mBlockAlign);
00231                                 }
00232                         }
00233                         break;
00234                 case 4:
00235                         {
00236                                 // 16-bit Quad surround
00237                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_QUAD16");
00238                                 if (!mFormat) return false;
00239 
00240                                 // Queue 250ms of audio data
00241                                 mBufferSize = mFormatData.mFormat->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00242 
00243                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00244                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData.mFormat->mBlockAlign);
00245                         }
00246                         break;
00247                 case 6:
00248                         {
00249                                 // 16-bit 5.1 surround
00250                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_51CHN16");
00251                                 if (!mFormat) return false;
00252 
00253                                 // Queue 250ms of audio data
00254                                 mBufferSize = mFormatData.mFormat->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00255 
00256                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00257                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData.mFormat->mBlockAlign);
00258                         }
00259                         break;
00260                 case 7:
00261                         {
00262                                 // 16-bit 7.1 surround
00263                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_71CHN16");
00264                                 if (!mFormat) return false;
00265 
00266                                 // Queue 250ms of audio data
00267                                 mBufferSize = mFormatData.mFormat->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00268 
00269                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00270                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData.mFormat->mBlockAlign);
00271                         }
00272                         break;
00273                 case 8:
00274                         {
00275                                 // 16-bit 8.1 surround
00276                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_81CHN16");
00277                                 if (!mFormat) return false;
00278 
00279                                 // Queue 250ms of audio data
00280                                 mBufferSize = mFormatData.mFormat->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00281 
00282                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00283                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData.mFormat->mBlockAlign);
00284                         }
00285                         break;
00286                 default:
00287                         {
00288                                 // Error message
00289                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- Unable to determine number of channels: defaulting to 16-bit stereo");
00290 
00291                                 // 16-bit stereo
00292                                 mFormat = AL_FORMAT_STEREO16;
00293 
00294                                 // Queue 250ms of audio data
00295                                 mBufferSize = mFormatData.mFormat->mAvgBytesPerSec >> 2;
00296 
00297                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00298                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % mFormatData.mFormat->mBlockAlign);
00299                         }
00300                         break;
00301                 }
00302                 return true;
00303         }
00304         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00305         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_release()
00306         {
00307                 if ( mSource!=AL_NONE )
00308                 {
00309                         ALuint src=AL_NONE;
00310                         setSource(src);
00311                 }
00312                 for (int i=0; i<NUM_BUFFERS; i++)
00313                 {
00314                         if (mBuffers[i]!=AL_NONE)
00315                                 alDeleteBuffers(1, &mBuffers[i]);
00316                 }
00317                 mPlayPosChanged = false;
00318                 mPlayPos = 0.f;
00319         }
00320         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00321         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_prebuffer()
00322         {
00323                 if (mSource==AL_NONE) return;
00324 
00325                 int i=0;
00326                 while ( i<NUM_BUFFERS )
00327                 {
00328                         if ( _stream(mBuffers[i]) )
00329                                 alSourceQueueBuffers(mSource, 1, &mBuffers[i++]);
00330                         else
00331                                 break;
00332                 }
00333         }
00334         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00335         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::setSource(ALuint& src)
00336         {
00337                 if (src!=AL_NONE)
00338                 {
00339                         // Set source
00340                         mSource=src;
00341 
00342                         // Fill data buffers
00343                         _prebuffer();
00344 
00345                         // Init source
00346                         _initSource();
00347                 }
00348                 else
00349                 {
00350                         // Unqueue buffers
00351                         _dequeue();
00352 
00353                         // Set source
00354                         mSource=src;
00355                 }
00356         }
00357         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00358         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_updateAudioBuffers()
00359         {
00360                 if(mSource == AL_NONE || !mPlay) return;
00361 
00362                 ALenum state;
00363                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_SOURCE_STATE, &state);
00364 
00365                 if (state == AL_PAUSED) return;
00366 
00367                 // Ran out of buffer data?
00368                 if (state == AL_STOPPED)
00369                 {
00370                         if(mStreamEOF)
00371                         {
00372                                 stop();
00373                                 // Finished callback
00374                                 if ( mFinishedCB && mFinCBEnabled )
00375                                         mFinishedCB->execute(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(this));
00376                                 return;
00377                         }
00378                         else
00379                         {
00380                                 // Clear audio data already played...
00381                                 _dequeue();
00382 
00383                                 // Fill with next chunk of audio...
00384                                 _prebuffer();
00385 
00386                                 // Play...
00387                                 alSourcePlay(mSource);
00388                         }
00389                 }
00390 
00391                 int processed;
00392 
00393                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_BUFFERS_PROCESSED, &processed);
00394 
00395                 while(processed--)
00396                 {
00397                         ALuint buffer;
00398 
00399                         alSourceUnqueueBuffers(mSource, 1, &buffer);
00400                         if ( _stream(buffer) ) 
00401                         {
00402                                 alSourceQueueBuffers(mSource, 1, &buffer);
00403                         }
00404                 }
00405 
00406                 // Handle play position change
00407                 if ( mPlayPosChanged )
00408                 {
00409                         _updatePlayPosition();
00410                         mPlayPosChanged = false;
00411                 }
00412         }
00413         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00414         bool OgreOggStreamWavSound::_stream(ALuint buffer)
00415         {
00416                 std::vector<char> audioData;
00417                 char* data;
00418                 int  bytes = 0;
00419                 int  result = 0;
00420 
00421                 // Create buffer
00422                 data = OGRE_ALLOC_T(char, mBufferSize, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00423                 
00424                 // Read only what was asked for
00425                 while(static_cast<int>(audioData.size()) < mBufferSize)
00426                 {
00427                         // Read up to a buffer's worth of data
00428                         bytes = static_cast<int>(mAudioStream->read(data, mBufferSize));
00429                         // EOF check
00430                         if (mAudioStream->eof())
00431                         {
00432                                 // If set to loop wrap to start of stream
00433                                 if ( mLoop )
00434                                 {
00435                                         mAudioStream->seek(mAudioOffset);
00446                                         if ( mLoopCB && mLoopCBEnabled )
00447                                                 mLoopCB->execute(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(this));
00448                                 }
00449                                 else
00450                                 {
00451                                         mStreamEOF=true;
00452                                         // EOF - finish.
00453                                         if (bytes==0) break;
00454                                 }
00455                         }
00456                         // Append to end of buffer
00457                         audioData.insert(audioData.end(), data, data + bytes);
00458                         // Keep track of read data
00459                         result+=bytes;
00460                 }
00461 
00462                 // EOF
00463                 if(result == 0)
00464                 {
00465                         OGRE_FREE(data, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00466                         return false;
00467                 }
00468 
00469                 alGetError();
00470                 // Copy buffer data
00471                 alBufferData(buffer, mFormat, &audioData[0], static_cast<ALsizei>(audioData.size()), mFormatData.mFormat->mSamplesPerSec);
00472 
00473                 // Cleanup
00474                 OGRE_FREE(data, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00475 
00476                 return true;
00477         }
00478         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00479         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_dequeue()
00480         {
00481                 if(mSource == AL_NONE)
00482                         return;
00483 
00484                 int queued=0;
00485 
00486                 alGetError();
00487 
00494                 ALenum state;
00495                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_SOURCE_STATE, &state);
00496 
00497                 // Force mSource to change state so the call to alSourceStop() will mark buffers correctly.
00498                 if (state == AL_INITIAL)
00499                         alSourcePlay(mSource);
00500 
00501                 // Stop source to allow unqueuing
00502                 alSourceStop(mSource);
00503 
00504                 // Get number of buffers queued on source
00505                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_BUFFERS_PROCESSED, &queued);
00506 
00507                 // Remove number of buffers from source
00508                 while (queued--)
00509                 {
00510                         ALuint buffer;
00511                         alSourceUnqueueBuffers(mSource, 1, &buffer);
00512 
00513                         // Any problems?
00514                         if ( alGetError() ) 
00515                         {
00516                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** Unable to unqueue buffers");
00517                         }
00518                 }
00519         }
00520         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00521         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_pauseImpl()
00522         {
00523                 if(mSource == AL_NONE) return;
00524 
00525                 alSourcePause(mSource);
00526         }
00527         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00528         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_playImpl()
00529         {
00530                 if(isPlaying()) return;
00531 
00532                 // Grab a source if not already attached
00533                 if (mSource == AL_NONE)
00534                         if ( !OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._requestSoundSource(this) )
00535                                 return;
00536 
00537                 // Play source
00538                 alSourcePlay(mSource);
00539                 if ( alGetError() )
00540                 {
00541                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("Unable to play sound");
00542                         return;
00543                 }
00544 
00545                 // Set play flag
00546                 mPlay = true;
00547         }
00548         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00549         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::setPlayPosition(Ogre::Real seconds)
00550         {
00551                 if(seconds < 0) return;
00552 
00553                 // Wrap
00554                 if ( seconds>mPlayTime ) 
00555                         do { seconds-=mPlayTime; } while ( seconds>mPlayTime );
00556 
00557                 // Store play position
00558                 mPlayPos = seconds;
00559 
00560                 // Set flag
00561                 mPlayPosChanged = true;
00562         }
00563         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00564         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_updatePlayPosition()
00565         {
00566                 if ( mSource==AL_NONE ) 
00567                         return;
00568 
00569                 // Get state
00570                 bool playing = isPlaying();
00571                 bool paused = isPaused();
00572 
00573                 // Stop playback
00574                 pause();
00575 
00576                 // mBufferSize is 1/4 of a second
00577                 size_t dataOffset = static_cast<size_t>(mPlayPos * mBufferSize * 4);
00578                 mAudioStream->seek(mAudioOffset + dataOffset);
00579 
00580                 // Unqueue audio
00581                 _dequeue();
00582 
00583                 // Fill buffers
00584                 _prebuffer();
00585 
00586                 // Set state
00587                 if              (playing) play();
00588                 else if (paused) pause();
00589         }
00590         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00591         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_stopImpl()
00592         {
00593                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00594                 {
00595                         // Remove audio data from source
00596                         _dequeue();
00597 
00598                         // Stop playback
00599                         mPlay=false;
00600 
00601                         // Reset stream pointer
00602                         mAudioStream->seek(mAudioOffset);
00603 
00604                         // Reload audio data
00605                         _prebuffer();
00606 
00607                         // Give up source immediately if specfied
00608                         if (mGiveUpSource) OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._releaseSoundSource(this);
00609                 }
00610         }
00611 }
